com.nokia.maps.component.touch

Class ContextMenuComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.component.AbstractMapComponent
      • com.nokia.maps.component.touch.TouchComponent
        • com.nokia.maps.component.touch.VisibleTouchComponent
          • com.nokia.maps.component.touch.ContextMenuComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapComponent

    public class ContextMenuComponent
extends VisibleTouchComponent
    This class defines a MapComponent which associates a context menu to a MapObject. When the MapObject is moved to the centre of the screen the associated context menu is displayed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ID
      This constant defines a unique ID for the Context Menu Component.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        This method clears all data associated with the ContextMenuComponent.

      • addData

        public void addData(MapObject mapObject,
           javax.microedition.lcdui.ChoiceGroup choiceGroup,
           javax.microedition.lcdui.Command[] commands)
        This method associates a Context Menu to a map object. The context menu is displayed when the MapObject is centred on screen.
        Parameters:
        mapObject - A MapObject that displays a context menu when centered on screen.
        choiceGroup - texts and images associated with this MapObject
        commands - Commands associated with this MapObject

      • addData

        public void addData(javax.microedition.lcdui.ChoiceGroup choiceGroup,
           javax.microedition.lcdui.Command[] commands)
        This method associates a Context Menu to a MapObject currently at the centre of the screen. The context menu is displayed whenever the MapObject is centred on screen thereafter.
        Parameters:
        choiceGroup - texts and images associated with the MapObject at the center of the screen.
        commands - Commands associated with this MapObject at the centre of the screen.

      • removeData

        public void removeData(MapObject mapObject)
        This method removes the association between a Context Menu and a MapObject.
        Parameters:
        mapObject - A MapObject is already associated to a context menu.

      • attach

        public void attach(MapDisplay map)
        This method is called whenever the component is attached to a MapDisplay, the component uses the reference to the currently attached map to decide on the dimensions of the context menu.
        Specified by:
        attach in interface MapComponent
        Overrides:
        attach in class AbstractMapComponent
        Parameters:
        map - the MapDisplay the component is currently attached to.

      • touchAt

        protected void touchAt(Point point)
        Highlights the initially selected menu item, and initialises the menu.
        Overrides:
        touchAt in class VisibleTouchComponent
        Parameters:
        point - the position touched on screen

      • onTouchEventStart

        protected boolean onTouchEventStart(int x,
                        int y)
        This method handles the touch start event by remembering the menu item touched.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEventStart in class VisibleTouchComponent
        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        Returns:
        false since the touch start event is not consumed by default.

      • onTouchEventClear

        protected boolean onTouchEventClear(int x,
                        int y)
        This method handles the touch cleared event by making the ContextMenu disappear. Clear occurs by pressing out of the hit area.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEventClear in class TouchComponent
        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        Returns:
        false since the touch clear event is not consumed by default.

      • onDragEvent

        protected boolean onDragEvent(int x,
                  int y)
        This method handles the drag event by shifting the menu items on screen.
        Overrides:
        onDragEvent in class VisibleTouchComponent
        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen that has been touched.
        Returns:
        true if the component consumes the event, false otherwise. Drag events are consumed if they occur within the hit area of the MapComponent, and the menu is currently visible.

      • onFlickEvent

        public boolean onFlickEvent(int x,
                   int y,
                   float direction,
                   int speed,
                   int speedX,
                   int speedY)
        This method handles the Flick event by shifting the menu items based on the flick speed.

        Note the MapComponent must be placed on a GestureMapCanvas if it is to receive flick() events.

        Overrides:
        onFlickEvent in class TouchComponent
        Parameters:
        x - x axis pixel coordinate on the screen where the flick event occurred.
        y - y axis pixel coordinate on the screen where the flick event occurred.
        direction - direction of the flick event.
        speed - speed of the flick.
        speedX - speed of the flick on the x axis.
        speedY - speed of the flick on the y axis.
        Returns:
        true if the component consumes the event, false otherwise. Flick events are consumed if they occur within the hit area of the MapComponent, and the menu is currently visible.

      • mapUpdated

        public void mapUpdated(boolean zoomChanged)
        This method is called when the map is updated, a check is made to see if one of the associated MapObjects is at the centre of the screen. If so, the Context Menu is displayed, the Context Menu is cleared otherwise.
        Specified by:
        mapUpdated in interface MapComponent
        Overrides:
        mapUpdated in class AbstractMapComponent
        Parameters:
        zoomChanged - Whether the zoom level of the MapDisplay has been changed.
